name: Viking 3000 -Interactive Showcase
description:
A small museum with a handful of stuff being worked on for a college project.

Featuring:

-Voxel Assets
-Grappling Hook
-Puppetmaster Active Ragdolls
-Weapon (theres just one usable weapon, lazy mofo over here)
-Physics objects that phase through terrain, our scientists spent years developing the tech for it

Theres a lot thats not being covered in this, such as game design and story that will be in the actual final game.

If your cursor is visible in game then tab out and back in, I'll have that fixed for the full game release :p
